Description: Start/stop of position register channel 1.
0 / Off (keep last state): Position Register
channel 1 is off and status bit keeps last state
1 / On: Position Register channel 1 is on
2 / Off (set state 0): Position Register channel 1 is
off and status bit is set to 0
3 / Off (set state 1): Position Register channel 1 is
off and status bit is set to 1
Modified settings become active immediately.
